bibl.title: Weaving Copts in the North Tombs of Tell el-Amarna. Avec résumés en anglais et en allemand.
bibl.note: Survey-work conducted by the author in 2007, 2008 and 2009. Offers an interpretation for the longitudinal pits within the floors and in the ceilings of some of the North Tombs of Tell el-Amarna. These grooves are remains of early Christian loom-emplacements.
bibl.seg: Sigl Johanna, Weaving Copts in the North Tombs of Tell el-Amarna. Avec résumés en anglais et en allemand.
Studien zur Altägyptischen Kultur 40 (2011) pp. 357-386, 10 tabl., 4 figg. et pll. 33-36.

Survey-work conducted by the author in 2007, 2008 and 2009. Offers an interpretation for the longitudinal pits within the floors and in the ceilings of some of the North Tombs of Tell el-Amarna. These grooves are remains of early Christian loom-emplacements.
